alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Richland; Stark; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Richland, Ashland, southwestern Stark, Wayne, northeastern Knox and Holmes Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rittman to near Polk to near Shelby. Movement was south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wooster, Ashland, Millersburg, Massillon, Orrville, Berlin, Rittman, Ontario, Lexington, Walnut Creek, Doylestown, Loudonville, Creston, Brewster, Navarre, Bellville, Dalton, Shreve and West Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Holmes; Knox; Richland; Stark; Wayne
